text: Ndipo pamene Mulungu adawapulumutsa, iwo adayamba kuchita zoipa pa dziko mopanda chilungamo. Oh inu anthu! Zoipa zanu simuchitira wina aliyense koma inu nokha. Chimenecho ndicho chisangalalo cha moyo wa pa dziko lapansi ndipo pambuyo pake inu mudzabwerera kwa Ife ndipo tidzakuuzani zonse zomwe mumachita
